holidays.title: National Banana Split Day
holidays.description: The original banana split wasn't created in an ice cream parlor but in a pharmacy!

holidays.title: Day of Songun
holidays.description: Putting the military first, and recognizing the history and leadership of Kim Jong-il.

holidays.title: Kiss and Make Up Day
holidays.description: Exercise your strength by forgiving — just kiss and make up!

holidays.title: National Burger Day
holidays.description: Join us as we bring you the best ways to celebrate National Burger Day.

holidays.title: National Park Service Founders Day
holidays.description: On this day, President Woodrow Wilson signed the Organic Act, creating the National Park Service.

holidays.title: National Secondhand Wardrobe Day
holidays.description: Buying clothes second hand and donating used clothing is crucial for cutting back our waste.

holidays.title: National Whiskey Sour Day
holidays.description: Why not kick back and pour yourself a glass of whiskey sour today?

holidays.title: Andrew Hussie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hussie lives on the revenue generated from merch sales and advertising revenue from the “Homestuck” website.

holidays.title: Billy Ray Cyrus’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s had an amazing career and he’s passed on this winning streak to his progeny

holidays.title: Blake Lively’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lively has done an excellent job balancing a full-time acting career and being a devoted mum

holidays.title: China Anne McClain’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was only seven years old when she started acting and she’s been going strong since.

holidays.title: Tim Burton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Burton’s style may not be everyone’s cup of tea but his artistic sense is without reproach
